pkgmetadata.longdescription: yEnc Decoding for Python---------------------------------Mofied the original yenc module by Alessandro Duca for use within SABnzbd.The module was extended to do header parsing and full yEnc decoding from a Pythonlist of chunks, the way in which data is retrieved from usenet.Currently CRC-checking of decoded data is disabled to allow for increased performance.It can only be re-enabled by locally altering 'sabyenc.h' and setting 'CRC_CHECK 1'.
